verses.verse: For this <WG3778> Melchisedec, <WG3198> king <WG935> of Salem, <WG4532> priest <WG2409> of the most <WG5310> high <WG5310> God, <WG2316> who <WG3588> met <WG4876> Abraham <WG11> returning <WG5290> from the slaughter <WG2871> of the kings, <WG935> and blessed <WG2127> him;

To whom <WG3739> also <WG2532> Abraham <WG11> gave a tenth <WG1181> part <WG3307> of all; <WG3956> first <WG4412> being by interpretation <WG2059> King <WG935> of righteousness, <WG1343> and after <WG1899> that also <WG2532> King <WG935> of Salem, <WG4532> which <WG3739> is, King <WG935> of peace; <WG1515>

Without <WG282> father, <WG540> without <WG282> mother, <WG282> without <WG35> descent, <WG35> having <WG2192> neither <WG3383> beginning <WG746> of days, <WG2250> nor <WG3383> end <WG5056> of life; <WG2222> but made <WG871> like <WG871> to the Son <WG5207> of God; <WG2316> stays <WG3306> a priest <WG2409> continually. <WG1519> <WG1336>

Now <WG1161> consider <WG2334> how <WG4080> great <WG4080> this <WG3778> man was, to whom <WG3739> even <WG2532> the patriarch <WG3966> Abraham <WG11> gave <WG1325> the tenth <WG1181> of the spoils. <WG205>

And truly <WG3303> they that are of the sons <WG5207> of Levi, <WG3017> who <WG3588> receive <WG2983> the office <WG2405> of the priesthood, <WG2405> have <WG2192> a commandment <WG1785> to take tithes <WG586> of the people <WG2992> according <WG2596> to the law, <WG3551> that is, of their brothers, <WG80> though <WG2539> they come <WG1831> out of the loins <WG3751> of Abraham: <WG11>
But he whose descent <WG1075> is not counted <WG1075> from them received <WG1183> tithes <WG1183> of Abraham, <WG11> and blessed <WG2127> him that had <WG2192> the promises. <WG1860>
And without <WG5565> all <WG3956> contradiction <WG485> the less <WG1640> is blessed <WG2127> of the better. <WG2909>
And here <WG5602> men <WG444> that die <WG599> receive <WG2983> tithes; <WG1181> but there <WG1563> he receives them, of whom it is witnessed <WG3140> that he lives. <WG2198>
And as I may so <WG5613> say, <WG2031> <WG2036> Levi <WG3017> also, <WG2532> who <WG3588> receives <WG2983> tithes, <WG1183> paid <WG1183> tithes <WG1183> in Abraham. <WG11>
For he was yet <WG2089> in the loins <WG3751> of his father, <WG3962> when <WG3753> Melchisedec <WG3198> met <WG4876> him.

If <WG1487> therefore <WG3767> perfection <WG5050> were by the Levitical <WG3020> priesthood, <WG2420> (for under <WG1909> it the people <WG2992> received <WG3549> the law, <WG3549>) what <WG5101> further <WG2089> need <WG5532> was there that another <WG2087> priest <WG2409> should rise <WG450> after <WG2596> the order <WG5010> of Melchisedec, <WG3198> and not be called <WG3004> after <WG2596> the order <WG5010> of Aaron? <WG2>
For the priesthood <WG2420> being changed, <WG3346> there is made <WG1096> of necessity <WG318> a change <WG3331> also <WG2532> of the law. <WG3551>

For he of whom <WG3739> these <WG5023> things <WG4229> are spoken <WG3004> pertains <WG3348> to another <WG2087> tribe, <WG5443> of which <WG3739> no <WG3762> man <WG3762> gave <WG4337> attendance <WG4337> at the altar. <WG2379>

For it is evident <WG4271> that our Lord <WG2962> sprang <WG393> out of Juda; <WG2455> of which <WG3739> tribe <WG5443> Moses <WG3475> spoke <WG2980> nothing <WG3762> concerning <WG4012> priesthood. <WG2420>
And it is yet <WG2089> far <WG4054> more <WG4055> evident: <WG2612> for that after <WG2596> the similitude <WG3665> of Melchisedec <WG3198> there rises <WG450> another <WG2087> priest, <WG2409>
Who <WG3739> is made, <WG1096> not after <WG2596> the law <WG3551> of a carnal <WG4559> commandment, <WG1785> but after <WG2596> the power <WG1411> of an endless <WG179> life. <WG2222>
For he testifies, <WG3140> You are a priest <WG2409> for ever <WG165> after <WG2596> the order <WG5010> of Melchisedec. <WG3198>
For there is truly <WG3303> a cancellation <WG115> of the commandment <WG1785> going <WG4254> before <WG4254> for the weakness <WG772> and unprofitableness <WG512> thereof. <WG846>
For the law <WG3551> made <WG5048> nothing <WG3762> perfect, <WG5048> but the bringing <WG1898> in of a better <WG2909> hope <WG1680> did; by the which <WG3739> we draw near <WG1448> to God. <WG2316>
And inasmuch <WG2596> <WG3745> as not without <WG5565> an oath <WG3728> he was made <WG5048> priest: <WG2409>

(For those <WG3588> priests <WG2409> were made <WG1096> without <WG5565> an oath; <WG3728> but this with an oath <WG3728> by him that said <WG3004> to him, The Lord <WG2962> swore <WG3660> and will not repent, <WG3338> You are a priest <WG2409> for ever <WG165> after <WG2596> the order <WG5010> of Melchisedec: <WG3198>)
By so <WG5118> much <WG5118> was Jesus <WG2424> made <WG1096> a surety <WG1450> of a better <WG2909> testament. <WG1242>
And they truly <WG3303> were many <WG4119> priests, <WG2409> because <WG1223> they were not suffered <WG2967> to continue <WG3887> by reason of death: <WG2288>
But this <WG3588> man, because <WG1223> he continues <WG3306> ever, <WG165> has <WG2192> an unchangeable <WG531> priesthood. <WG2420>

Why <WG3606> he is able <WG1410> also <WG2532> to save <WG4982> them to the uttermost <WG3838> that come <WG4334> to God <WG2316> by him, seeing he ever <WG3842> lives <WG2198> to make <WG1793> intercession <WG1793> for them.

For such <WG5108> an high <WG749> priest <WG749> became <WG4241> us, who is holy, <WG3741> harmless, <WG172> undefiled, <WG283> separate <WG5562> from sinners, <WG268> and made <WG1096> higher <WG5308> than the heavens; <WG3772>

Who <WG3739> needs <WG2192> <WG318> not daily, <WG2596> <WG2250> as those <WG3588> high <WG749> priests, <WG749> to offer <WG399> up sacrifice, <WG2378> first <WG4386> for his own <WG2398> sins, <WG266> and then <WG1899> for the people's: <WG2992> for this <WG5124> he did <WG4160> once, <WG2178> when he offered up himself. <WG1438>

For the law <WG3551> makes <WG2525> men <WG444> high <WG749> priests <WG749> which have <WG2192> infirmity; <WG769> but the word <WG3056> of the oath, <WG3728> which <WG3588> was since <WG3326> the law, <WG3551> makes the Son, <WG5207> who is consecrated <WG5048> for ever more. <WG3588> <WG165>
